data.title: Two Confessions Original 1957 Polish A1 Movie Poster
data.meta_description: Original 1957 Polish A1 poster by Wiktor Gorka for the film Two Confessions (Ket vallomas) directed by Marton Keleti with Mari Torocsik / Marianne Krencsey / Lajos Oze / Kalman Koletar.
data.text:
